SELECT * FROM wa_order WHERE 1 = 1
AND order_id LIKE '%${orderId}%'
AND order_no LIKE '%${orderNo}%'
AND prod_name LIKE '%${prodName}%'

SELECT b.`user_id`,b.`user_name`,a.order_id,a.is_self_car,a.`order_no`,a.`prod_name`,a.`order_date`,a.`sale_num`,a.`sale_money`,a.`from_region_id`,a.`from_region_addr`,a.`to_region_id`,a.`to_region_addr`,a.`order_state`,c.`contacts`,c.`con_tel`,c.deliver_date,c.receive_date,d.`prod_id`,d.`prod_img`,d.`prod_type` FROM wa_order a LEFT JOIN wa_user b ON a.`user_id`=b.`user_id` LEFT JOIN wa_order_logistics_info c ON a.`order_id`=c.`order_id` LEFT JOIN wa_prod d ON a.`prod_id`=d.`prod_id` WHERE a.`order_id`=#{orderId}

SELECT b.`user_id`,b.`user_name`,a.`order_id`,a.`order_no`,a.`order_date`,a.`prod_name`,a.`sale_num`,a.`sale_money`,a.`is_self_car`,a.`order_state`,c.`contacts`,c.`con_tel`,c.`deliver_date`,c.`receive_date`,d.`order_price`,d.`order_number`,f.`prod_id`,f.`prod_img`,f.`prod_type`,e.deliver_num_count FROM wa_order a LEFT JOIN wa_user b ON a.`user_id`=b.`user_id` LEFT JOIN wa_prod f ON a.`prod_id`=f.`prod_id` LEFT JOIN wa_order_logistics_info c ON a.`order_id`=c.`order_id` RIGHT JOIN wa_order_log d ON a.`order_id`=d.`order_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(`zorder_num`) deliver_num_count FROM wa_zorder WHERE order_id=#{orderId}) e ON 1=1 WHERE a.`order_id`=#{orderId} ORDER BY d.`operation_time` DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.order_id,a.is_self_car,a.`order_no`,a.`prod_name`,a.`order_date`,a.`from_region_id`,a.`from_region_addr`,a.`to_region_id`,a.`to_region_addr`,a.`order_state`,b.logistics_id,b.customer_user_name,b.customer_user_id,b.sender_user_id,c.deliver_date,c.receive_date,c.vehicle_grab_id FROM wa_order a LEFT JOIN wa_logistics_info b ON a.`order_id`=b.order_id LEFT JOIN wa_vehicle_grab c ON b.vehicle_grab_id=c.vehicle_grab_id WHERE a.`order_id`=#{orderId}
select * from wa_order WHERE order_id=#{orderId}

SELECT a.`order_id`,a.`is_self_car`,a.`prod_name`,a.`sale_num`,b.`user_name`,c.deliver_num_count,IFNULL((d.`prod_num`-d.`sale_num`),d.`prod_num`) rest_num,e.order_number,e.`order_price` FROM wa_order a LEFT JOIN wa_user b ON a.`user_id`=b.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(`zorder_num`),0) deliver_num_count FROM wa_zorder WHERE order_id=#{orderId}) c ON 1=1 LEFT JOIN wa_prod d ON a.`prod_id`=d.`prod_id` RIGHT JOIN wa_order_log e ON a.`order_id`=e.`order_id` WHERE a.`order_id`=#{orderId} ORDER BY e.`operation_time` DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.`order_id`,a.`order_no`,a.prod_name,a.`order_date`,a.`prod_id`,a.`is_self_car`,a.sale_num,a.sale_money,a.`confirm_number`,a.`confirm_price`,a.`order_state`,b.`prod_img`,b.`prod_type`,c.`deliver_date`,c.`receive_date` FROM wa_order a LEFT JOIN wa_prod b ON a.`prod_id`=b.`prod_id` LEFT JOIN wa_order_logistics_info c ON a.`order_id`=c.`order_id` WHERE a.`order_id`=#{orderId}

SELECT a.`order_id`,a.`is_self_car`,a.from_region_id,a.`from_region_addr`,a.`to_region_id`,a.`to_region_addr`,a.`user_id` customer_id,a.`supplier_id` seller_id,cus.`user_name` customer_name,seller.`user_name` seller_name FROM wa_order a LEFT JOIN wa_user cus ON a.`user_id`=cus.`user_id` LEFT JOIN wa_user seller ON a.`supplier_id`=seller.`user_id` WHERE a.`order_id`=#{orderId}
